DOC.brief_summary: The study explore effectiveness new-style anterior vaginal wall mesh treatment female stress urinary incontinence ( SUI ) . Meshes make Gynemech TM PS , ( Johnson & Johnson Shanghai Medical Equipment Co. China Food Drug Administration ( CFDA ) registration No . 3460365 , size 10 Ã— 15cm ) . Meshes cut appropriate size . The incontinence questionnaire summary table ( ICIQ-SF ) , pad test , urodynamic diagnostic test use preoperative assessment evaluation postoperative surgical outcome complication . The result compare one-year cure rate Burch trans vaginal taping ( TVT ) surgery . The analysis indicate surgery use new-style anterior vaginal mesh , minimally invasive procedure , achieve expectation similar cure rate Burch , TVT/ trans vaginal tap obturator ( TVT-O ) surgery , also low economic cost complication rate TVT /TVT-O approach . The evaluation long-term treatment effect need follow-up patient .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect New-style Vaginal Repair Mesh Treatment Female Stress Urinary Incontinence
DOC.criteria: Patients clinically biopsy confirm nonneoplastic lesion genital skin mucous membrane ( nonneoplasia epithelial disorder skin mucosa vulva ) . Symptoms include repeat itching , discoloration , rhagades , loss skin elasticity dyspareunia affect patient ' quality life . Atypical hyperplasia vulvar cancer confirm biopsy genital lesion ; Vulvovaginal gynecological trauma , acute inflammatory disease acute illness need urgent care ; Combined serious gynecological disease ( symptomatic hysteromyoma , ovarian tumor , etc . ) , and/or severe organ disease ( heart , lung , brain renal disease/failure ) need immediate treatment ; Other type cancer require urgent care .
